data.comment: QPR kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Chuba Akpom heads in to make it 0-1 at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium.
In the minute 28, Bright Osayi-Samuel gets an equalizer for QPR. The score is now 1-1.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Dean Whitestone blows to start the second-half. Middlesbrough with the kick-off.
In the minute 56, Dael Fry is replacing Grant Hall for the away team.
The home team replace George Thomas with Tom Carroll.
Sam Morsy is on a sub for Djed Spence for Middlesbrough.
In the minute 73, QPR make their second substitution with Paul Smyth replacing Ilias Chair.
At Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium, Anfernee Dijksteel has been yellow-carded for the away team.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
